file_content.text: Ha! I knew the vicious little scruffball would double-cross you!
Have a nice life, short as it's going to be!
Won't let... Ruugar win....
Hmph. There's a reason I run things around here....
You just raided your last ship!
Bye, now!
All right now, how about we make this a proper fight?!
Oh, you've gone and done it now...!
You want a fight, you got a fight!
Pearl! Oh, you scum sucking...!
That's it, Pearl!
Eat beak!
Woo! Go Pearl go!
Come on! Fight harder!
You're all as good as dead!
Thought Ruugar would find me an actual challenge.
Haha!
You just keep coming, huh? Not a lick of sense in any of you!
Go ahead and die now!
Here we go, Pearl! It's on!
So, you're the sorry bunch who fell for Ruugar's blubbering. You can forget any promises he made you!
I only backstabbed him because he backstabbed me first! It's what he does best.
All right, Ravagers, this is your captain. Regroup and haul out!
Hey, your puppets were plenty tough--got to hand it to you! Oh, sorry. Bad choice of words.
That's right, you shot too soon!
If they don't kill you, Ruugar, you slimy hairball, I definitely will! Kisses!
Got some nerve, you bunch of loonies, sticking your noses where they don't belong. Gonna cut them right off is what I'm gonna do!
Bulo? Blast it, Bulo, come in! Why aren't you out delivering?
Better get your ugly rear in gear or I'll find you a permanent replacement!
Cora?! No!
Someone get this bucket out of harm's way!
Take evasive action! Move it!
Ruugar's hitting us with everything!
